### Some Important Concepts

1. Strings
2. Lifetime

#### Some small Tips for the early period

1. Do not use references
2. Copy and clone everything
3. Follow the compiler

## Materials

### Books in order

- [The Rust Book](https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/) by Rust Official Team
- [Programming Rust, 2nd](https://www.amazon.com/Programming-Rust-Fast-Systems-Development/dp/1492052590/) by Jim Blandy
- [Rust in Action](https://www.manning.com/books/rust-in-action) by Tim McNamara
- [Comprehensive Rust](https://google.github.io/comprehensive-rust/) by Google
- [Rust Cookbook](https://rust-lang-nursery.github.io/rust-cookbook/)
- [Rust for Rustaceans](https://rust-for-rustaceans.com/) by Jon Gjengset

- [Tim McNamara](https://www.youtube.com/@timclicks)
